name: Aplestia
description: Aplestia is a light-hearted, unepic, fun, cynical and adventurous rpg with turn-based combat! Fight monsters, bosses, get your loot and find secret rooms and epic equipment.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any dual core clocked at 2 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9100 or better (DirectX 9.0 Compatible) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 450 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound Additional Notes: 64bit OS only
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any dual core clocked at 2.2 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9800 or better (DirectX 9.0 Compatible) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound Additional Notes: 64bit OS only
